entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Victoriaville
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:23 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -1.1°C

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 4.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 4. Wind chill minus 6 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending in the morning then cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 7 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Snow mixed with ice pellets. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow mixed with ice pellets beginning late in the evening. Local blowing snow overnight. Snow and ice pellet amount possibly reaching 15 cm. Wind becoming northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 late in the evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 7 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EST Tuesday 03 January 2023
